content.detailedDescription: I was at work , right around noon july 25 / 13( outside for some fresh air w/t 2 co workers ) i looked at a airplane just in the distance and noticed there were 2 objects near the aircraft .The plane seemed to be doing a right turn .I noticed 2 white " things " in the air , pretty close to the plane.  ( if this plane didn't see it , i would be very surprised )at first , i thought they may have been skydivers and waited for their parachutes to open ... they didn't. then i thought they could be gliders , but they were clearly too high and gliders can't hover.After i eliminated the only 2 possibilities ..I then saw one of them move to the north of the first one ( i'm guessing a couple of miles away , then it stopped , paused for about 10 seconds and flew back to the first one .. they were both stationary for at least a minute then the second one seemed to dissolve . the first one started to head towards the 3 of us and was heading east towards montreal.The whole event lasted at least 10 minutes .  i was excited to witness this event.I believe it was my 3rd sighting since i was about 9 years old ( approx. 36 years )  i know it sounds weird but i believe its 3 times now.Only 1 of my coworkers saw what orb / sphere in the distance . the 3rd one us just couldn't see what we saw. we lost sight of the object in the distance no sound / no vapour trail & it flew / hovered at about the same altitude as a commercial airliner and seemed to travel about 3 times their speed . this happened about 4 - 5 miles from the ottawa airport
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb  or  sphere like

content.detailedDescription:
We were in derby, ct and we were driving home from the university of new haven. 
the sky was split and we took a picture of the dark side and the light side. 
we did not notice it after we took the picture but we look closer and then we saw it looked liked at ufo. 
it was big and dull and it hovered and moves with the clouds. 
we had no reactions during the sighting because we didn't know or see it. after the sighting we were excited and were eager to find out if is was a real ufo. 
we drove away.
content.summary: Looks like it was cloaking itself within the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: In flight from california out from kc about one hour when a big bright blue ball of light passed by the plane at a super fast rate of speed.
content.summary: Blue ball light

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in bed looking up at the stars with my balcony door open, then suddenly i see an orange colored orb appear. it hovers for about 5 seconds and then shoots down, again it hovers for another couple of seconds and very quickly shoots to the left. 
very eery feeling came over me but of course i go looking for it. but its to fast. my building prevented me from seeing it. i went downstairs and nothing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange orb seen from bedroom balcony.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday night july 20th 2013 my family wanted to have a small bondfire in the yard so i got the wood in the pit and started the fire. a little time later my 10 year old daughter was on our deck with a friend said look dad a light.  i looked up towards the north and i seen a white ball heading twords us moving quite fast.  it passed over us me my girlfriend my 10 year old daughter and her 8 year old friend all seen it.  afterwards everyone went back into the house to do something and i stood in the lawn looking twords the south where the object was last seen.  i waited a couple of minuets and was about to go back into the house my self when i started to see the object again this time moving from the south to the north almost the same exact trajectory except in reverse.  i yelled for my girlfriend who was still in the house.  she came out and said what? i said look! here it comes again.  i was pointing at it and as it got directly above our heads it pulsated or got really bright i would say about three or four times its normal size this lasted only very briefly then it shrunk down to the size when i first seen it.  
we stood there in amazement and i said to my girlfriend did you see that? and she said yea i seen it.  i said i told you i have been seeing things like this now do you believe me and she said yes i believe you now. in july of 2010 my daughter and i seen one just like this one but it flew much closer in the sky than this one i would say right above tree top level. my daughter is more of a star gazer as i am she seems to spot them more often that i do.  a month or so earlier of this year we were fishing at sawmill bridge in okoboji, iowa and she said look dad a light.  there was a small ball flying from the west to the east over east lake okoboji so i have seen two this year.
content.summary: A small solid white ball of light.

content.detailedDescription:
I had seen lights previously in my years as a carpenter and these were similar to the one other in santa barbara, ca.  i felt a little uncomfortable and decided to take a break at the truck stop, where i was followed by  another driver who assured me that he had seen the exact same thing. the lights on this time of day? they were traveling south in a triangle formation, possibly 300-400 mph. as my angle of view changed  slightly i could see a clear dome shape on top and a typical disc shape body. the formation continued south and shrank out of sight not speeding up but did change their altitude and it seemed that they were going to land. tractor trailer operators transporting cargo are not allowed to leave their contracted route. i really wanted to go see this landing but not having a safe route directly south i wrote it off to maybe someday.
i mentioned it to my sister later that year after another sighting but she preferred as most to keep it to yourself. safe to say as many ufo's that i have been able to describe in detail, the two or three others that i have seen from just out of range will be left to curiousity down the road.
content.summary: Enroute to atlanta i watched three lights travel from my se to the south in blue sky and perfect visibility.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:30 pm on july 18, 2013, a friend and i walked back the lane way on my parents' farm to smoke some marijuana and look out at the stars. after we finished smoking and spent some time looking into the sky, we noticed a bright light in the sky to the south east. we are both long time smokers and have become quite immune to most of the mind-altering effects of the drug. we have never experienced visual hallucinations and were very confident that we were not simply "seeing things." we have estimated that we noticed this light at approximately 11:40pm. 

the object appeared very much like a regular star but it was brighter than all other stars in the sky. we soon noticed that it was moving up and to the south west on a curved flight path. we observed the light either growing dimmer and getting further away from us (or both) as it moving along its flight path. we discussed what it was that we were looking at, concluding that it was likely we were witnessed a jet's afterburners as it flew off into the distance. however, we found it strange that we heard absolutely no noise. 

after approximately 20-30 seconds of watching the object grow dimmer in the sky, we lost sight of it. within another few seconds we saw the object again (or another similar object) around the same area of the sky. when we first observed it it was hovering perfectly still in the sky, but within a few seconds it began moving laterally. we took note of its position in relation to a couple nearby stars, and were able to confirm that it was indeed moving in relation to these reference points. its flight path was erratic and unpredictable. on more than one occasion it instantaneously switched directions, then switched again 2-3 seconds later. it moved mostly horizontally in the sky, but at times it moved up and down as well. the flight path was often curved, rather than straight. it often stopped to hover for a time, then continued moving again. at one point the object hovered in the same position in the sky while two planes flew by on opposite sides along linear flight paths. this made for easy reference and assured us that we were not looking at some ordinary plane. 

after watching the erratic flight path for approximately 2-3 minutes and losing sight of it, we noticed that the same object or another object had appeared lower in the sky. this object was never seen moving, and appeared to be either larger or closer to us (or both). it had multiple lights on it that flashed different colours (white, yellow and red) in a seemingly random manner. we observed this object for approximately 30 seconds to a minute before observing it instantaneously disappear from sight. this was the end of the sighting(s), although we spent some time scanning for sky for more objects. 

we were actively trying to determine what we were looking at for most of the sighting. although we thought it may have been a jet during the first phase of the sighting, once the object began changing directions in the sky we realized it could not have been any conventional aircraft. both of us have had a long standing interest in the ufo phenomenon, and we eventually concluded that we were looking at a genuine "ufo," whatever that entails. this got us quite excited, since we had both wanted to see a ufo for years now. we both consider the sighting to have been a very significant moment in our lives. my friend considers it to have solidified his belief in ufos, while i consider it to have been something of a spiritual experience. i've been confident that the ufo phenomenon in real for approximately 3 years now, so it did little to alter my beliefs.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like object seen moving erratically in the sky and hovering at times. last seen hovering low in the sky and flashing different coloured lights.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
We posted our account on reddit. direct link: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

1. we were on the 15th floor of a high rise building in atlanta. we were working.

2. we were looking out the window and it was significantly above a 200ft ferris wheel. 

3. various accounts in the office: a kite, a stealth bomber, a drone, an airplane & a weather balloon. 

4. it hovered mostly stationary with occasional changes in elevation.

5. curious. 

6. went to upload the video we just took and it was gone.

multiple witnesses posted their experience on reddit. (link above)
content.summary: Hovering object in sky over downtown atlanta. object was about 20feet wide.

content.detailedDescription: I had expected the unusual during my travelers and these four objects seemed to want to get the attention of all in the area.I was driving east on i 70 outside of lawrence kansas when i noticed some lights doing ovals in the sky. they were not attempting to hide anything except the fact that maybe they would make actual physical contact and maybe they wouldn't. to display an aerial acrobat maneuvers with four participants in front of traffic on i 70 at such high speeds was nothing less than watch this!!!!!! three illuminated and one not illuminated crafts started from my se and maneuvered south while doing ovals about a mile in diameter. each within a quarter mile of the other and all stopped after their second oval instantly about a mile south from their starting point. the fourth maneuvered west and disappeared and the illuminated three stayed in position for 2-3 minutes and then shrank into the southern horizon, maybe to show off down on i 20 or something.I am going back to truck driving and will report any sightings at my ealiest opportunity. i needed to get these in order before i start my next voyage in august.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving tractor trailer from denver to chicago ill. i watched three bright white, illuminated crafts do ovals across the corn fields.

content.detailedDescription: I had been a solo driver and the company wanted me to team up so i could train incoming truck driving students. a small world my first trainee was a forman from circus vargus, where i had worked in 1984.20 years later we meet,he left the circus for commercial driving. his name is john, nickname was smerf. he was driving and i was in the sleeper berth. i went up front to check on his awareness and he joked about driving all the way to portland, oregon. i waited a couple hours and when i returned to the passenger seat we made plans to change out at the next truck stop, maybe just before boise, idaho. there was an object i just glanced at and he brought my attention back to it. as the craft drew closer we both recognized it to be a ufo. the path it took was from sw of i 84 and continued to the ne at 300-400 mph. it made a loud noise as it changed direction slightly nne from ne, possibly from passing within a hundred yards of us. he stated that 'do not tell anyone of this and said he would deny it all'. the dispatcher contacted us and asked if i had divulged the ufo sighting at hazleton, pa. i said "what are you talking about?" dispatcher- called me into the terminal and i was questioned about both incidents. i did not disclose any others to protect myself from fear that i would scare new students, costing my employment. the interview went well and the supervisor said "if that's what he saw, thats what he saw".
content.summary: Team driving to portland oregon from denver colorado, my teammate and i watched a craft come from the sw and pass in front of us and continued on ne

content.detailedDescription: We we coming home from meijer and putting groceries inside of the house, when we spotted 3 different orange lights. the first two were 2 minutes apart, and the third was 5 minutes from the last one. they all came from the same area and then went southwest, but in different and a spread out way. we've seen this lights many times before, starting last year around the 4th of july. what are they!?!?!?
content.summary: 3 orange lights spotted above lincoln park, mi

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driving for a national carrier i expected to see the country and enjoyed the experience. my pick ups and deliveries on occassion to hazleton,pennsylvania usually went smoothly and this one did as well. starting to make the connection onto i 80 i noticed an object 30 x 50 feet cone shaped, silver with black lines running down it off to my right, about 300 feet up. looking through the trees i first thought it was some building or something, but as i cleared the trees, i recognized it to be hovering almost directly over i 80. i proceeded west and noticed a larger craft just above it, a huge disc with a sharp edge that tapered to the center. the lower section of the craft lowered down while hovering and i did not see the smaller craft after so i presume it entered the larger craft. the lower section appeared to be a louvered non rotating level of the craft, maybe to dispatch and accept smaller craft. i looked over i 80 to the eastbound traffic and nobody was looking around up or down. maybe fear, but a couple were pointing towards the large craft and at first were surprised then kind of fearful. i proceeded on to my destination all the while checking the cb and am<fm radio for some information. 50 -100 people saw the large craft and i don't know how many saw the small craft.
content.summary: I had picked up in hazleton pa and headed north to get on i80 west. as i approache i 80 i saw a cone shaped craft hovering just northeast. there were some trees but as i got on i80 it was clear that this was not any regular aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
In bed, looking out window.
bright, but not blinding, white circle went west in sky.
no noise.
not an aircraft.
checked iss data this morning and found no correlation.
felt no surprise other than happiness.
i am a former mufon f.I.
content.summary: Bright white circle went west

content.detailedDescription: I saw two starlike light with no sound,one traveling from the left of me in the sky,the other one was coming from the left of the sky.I though they were goin to meet in the sky but the one on the left of the sky went behind the treeline and i though it would come out but didnt.The light on the right just stopped and is still hovering inthe sky bobbing around.Ive seen these since i was a kid.It was scary to me then but now im curious instead of scared.Its still there right now hovering and bobbing around.I have no video camera or phone with a camera.I wish i did right now..
content.summary: One was coming from the left of the sky,one was coming from the right of the sky....One dissapeared behind treetop the other one is still there hovering and bobbing around

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for a bus at the station and off in the distance (not sure how far), a faint flash caught my attention in the sky. it blended in quite well to the cloudless, sunny sky. i observed an object, cigar-like in shape, on a straight and downward path at first, then the object became smaller and spherical in shape. it stopped moving after a bit and stayed in one spot, where it seemed to have vanished completely. i was unable to continue to view it as i was traveling at that point. prior to leaving the station (and after it "vanished"), i had noticed an airplane in another part of the sky opposite the ufo. it was lower in the sky than the object i observed, and there was a clear contrail whereas the object made none.
content.summary: Cigar shaped day ufo changes to sphere, vanishes.

content.detailedDescription: This is an unknown object that has been apearing frequently off and on for some time. we were able to film this object for the 1st time tonite, for aprox 3min.. i also witnessed a different multi ship event last week. please help!
content.summary: This ufo is a reacurring event.

content.detailedDescription: When i was walking from my car to my apparent i first saw a cop car and then the lights in the sky i actually thought oh it must be a helicopter the cop was writing notes, i look up at the sky cause now i'm thinking umm there's no noise just the noise of crickets . the lights were swooshing in all different directions and crashing through each other and repeating it again it wasn't a light from the ground or another light source as the orbs were too big. i recorded it and ran inside to tell my husband to run out he did but it had gone.
content.summary: Orb shapes, bright and misty and extreamly fast

content.detailedDescription: On the 7-22-13, i was traveling by myself northwest down 410.  i exited  on northwest military drive around 9:00 pm. i first noticed the red, blue and green lights spinning in a circular motion.  i wasn't sure what i was looking at, but after noticing how it was hovering, disappearing and moving in a southerly to northerly path and changing direction of flight at incredible speeds i could only guess it was a strange spacecraft.  since there is no turn around coming off northwest military i had to turn around on the first residential street to my right.  i turned around and waited at the light, but could not see the flying object.  i waited for a few minutes trying to locate the craft.  when the light turned green i turned to my left and the craft appeared to me again this time on my left side. it felt like it was hovering so close to my vehicle, but i couldn't make out how big the object was.  it stayed hovering right off the side of the street, but i didn't notice anyone else slowing down to look.  it felt like i was the only one seeing this thing. i was excited to see the object, but i felt it was only trying to make an appearance to me.  i cant believe no one else has reported this event it was right off the freaking freeway. i lost sight of the object after i turned crossed over the bridge heading toward the stoplight.  i turned left and entered the 410 entrance going back northeast toward north star mall.  i looked to my left and noticed it faded away into the night.  it was pretty clear that night and we had a lot of moonlight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Exiting northwest military drive coming from 410 east.

content.detailedDescription: I live in west loveland,colorado, near the foothills, i was grilling on my patio on the west side of the house. it was near dusk, but still light out.My grill faces east. i turned and looked southwest (over my right shoulder)observing the clouds low over the mountains had kind of a smoky look to it.It made me wonder if we had another forest fire in the area.I then turned back to the grill to turn my dinner over and stepped back to the left a little and movement in the sky to the north caught my attention. there was low -lying cloud cover and the object was traveling in the base of the clouds. it was disk shaped and traveling from east to west. there was absolutely no sound except an airplane in the distance somewhere and it was so low in the clouds that it almost looked like it had a slight layer of mist around it. the disk shaped object traveled slowly to the west, then banked to the north west allowing me to see the entire underside of it. it headed north into the clouds. i stayed there looking for it for about 30 seconds and caught a glimpse of it in a break in the clouds, just for a few seconds as it was flying away from me, and then it disappeared. there were no lights on it when i saw it, and it moved silently and smoothly.
content.summary: I observed a goldish-coppery disk to the north, moving west, it abrubtly banked northwest allowing me to see the underside, leveled out and moved northwest farther into clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30 pm est, i was rolling a garbage can to the curb when i noticed a very bright light or object in the western sky. as soon as the garbage can was in place, i ran inside to get a very cheap pair of binoculars.  they were free at a car dealership, but they are far superior to the naked eye.  in the few moments it took me to retrieve the binoculars, the object had crossed the sky and was now further north. i am a sky watcher (have seen quite a few anomalies over the past year or two)so i got a chair and braved the mosquitoes in order to observe the unusual object. i kept a close eye on the object for 50 minutes and saw it slowly descend behind a house and trees. the object was pretty far away, but i noticed that it was chevron-shaped and had at least one red light along with several white lights. the lights occasionally pulsated and seemed to start to fade toward the end of my observation. i last observed the object around 10:10 pm est in the northwest sky.
content.summary: Observed chevron-shaped object in partly cloudy night sky in northern kentucky

content.detailedDescription: Observed four large, reddish/pinkish/orange lights in loose formation on a heading from ne to sw, slightly ne of my home in frenchtown twp. near monroe, mi. the sky was not quite completely dark and i could see stars in the area between the lights. the lights were steady, no strobes, no other colors. the lights all moved in the same direction at the same speed- probably three times as fast as a commercial airliner would appear to be moving when very high. the light source was indeterminable, but appeared much larger than any known aircraft based on their apparent height. no sound was heard. they all disappeared/ went out at the same time when they were nearly overhead.
content.summary: Four large odd-colored steady light sources moving in formation

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear night so i opened my bedroom window as i was getting ready for bed. it was early morning, 2:40 am, september 10, 2011. i had just finished working on graduate studies and during that semester i typically got to bed anywhere between midnight and 6am. from my viewpoint i could watch planes in the distance. i didnt sleep well and would also watch the stars travel across the sky for hours. 
commercial plane traffic from my window is easily identified and they always travel from the south (atlanta) to the north. their flight is calm and slow across the sky. i noticed the ufo because it had unusually bright yellow-orange and white lights. they didnt flash like a plane but pulsated. i watched it travel from the south, closer to me than the planes, and stop in the distance. i watched it for about five minutes from my bed as it just hovered there. there are two very tall poplar trees to the northwest of my home about 100 yards away. the tree tops make a distinct v shape. they served as the sights through which i saw the ufo hover and also helped me determine what direction the object traveled away from me(northwest). 
i was not scared. i was curious and strangely calm. so calm, in fact, that i started burning facts about my experience into my mind. i knew i was experiencing something amazing. i got the telescope out of the closet but could not get the ufo to come into focus. it was frustrating but the object was close enough to see without it. i just wanted to see all that i could. the ufo hovered above the trees for about 15 more minutes before shooting off at a very high rate of speed to the northwest and out of my sight. a path from my window to the two trees revealed, by map,  that the object was possibly over the water treatment plant for the county, above the high school, and then shot into the chattahoochee forest. 
i was calm and logical while i saw the object. my fianc��� was in bed and had been asleep for a while. he worked full time and attended school full time during that part of our lives. i chose not to wake him because he rarely slept enough and frankly has a fear of ufos. it seemed so reasonable to let him sleep at the time although in hindsight i cant understand why i didnt wake him. after the object shot off i returned the telescope to the closet and went back to bed. 
i have since watched for a return of the same object to no avail. september 10, 2012 i stayed up awaiting the return and saw nothing. its strange. i have never believed in ufos but i know very well what i experienced and i will never forget.
content.summary: Straight line path south to north. hovered for 20 minutes over trees. shot off at great speed northwest.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was very dark out upon my return home from the store. as i began to turn the wheel of my car to pull into my driveway i immediatly noticed a bright flame like object approaching my direction from the back yard/woods. it was really low and very noticeable. so noticeable that i stopped my car half way in the street and half way in the driveway and hopped out to get a better look. i immediatly grabbed my iphone and hit record. the object was about 10 ft above the roof line of the house and seemed to almost purposely move between my house and the neighbors rather than over the tops of the roofs. the object moved very slowly and with zero noise. as it made its way between the two houses and was to the front, i noticed it took a distinct turn in my direction. a very distinct turn. it completely stopped and hovered above my driveway for at least 30 to 40 seconds. as weird as it may sound, it almost seemed as if it was checking me out. it was then that i noticed the object appeared as if it really had no particular shape. it was almost like flying fire , very bright fire. i was amazed and baffled at the same time. while it hovered, i also noticed there was some bits of black color rolling around inside of this bright flame like object, almost as if there was gases in it. its very hard to explain. there was no trail behind it and nothing was dropping from it at all. after noticing it stop right in front of and above me i checked my video screen to make sure i was getting it in the screen. the wierdest thing was, when i loooked in my video screen, it was a perfectly shaped orb like circle...Still bright red and orange but a perfect circle with very defined edges and much smaller but when i looked at it with my own eyes it had no specific shape at all, looked like a flame, and appeared much closer. dont know why it was a perfect circle in my video but not when i viewed it with my own eyes. it was the weirdest thing!! the object then decided to move again. it traveled in front of the house, began moving up a little higher and to the west then outta nowhere, it disappeared right in front of my eyes. i did notice that when it disappeared, it was almost as if it shrunk and at that exact moment,for a split second, i saw a small white/silver light as it disappeared. again, i was completely baffled. i ran in the house and ran to the back deck to see if maybe my neighbors were burning things but they were not. i came back in and tried to show my sister the video and it was gone..Poof...Like i never recorded anything!! my sister then said the cable had just gone out too and the tv had to be reset. so weird. i also ruled out my initial thought that maybe it was a chinese lantern because one, it did not look like a lantern at all nor was it shaped as such and two, it traveled in a distinct like directional pattern, horizontially, stopped and hovered above me, and did not even travel up higher into the sky until it disappeared. 30 minutes or so later my sister was on back deck and screamed out because she saw a very very large bright white light streak through a clearing in our backyard trees. she said it was not actually in the woods but behind them and very very big and fast. it shot from southwest to southeast. the next day my neice before even hearing of the white light my sister saw, she said at that same exact time, while she was on her way to her boyfriends in robertsville, mo a huge white light seemed to shoot towards her vehicle and then up. she said it happened so fast and she had no idea what it was but it was not above the horizon. almost as if it was right on front of her but maybe it was just tht large and bright. so, i found it very odd all of this happened within a 30 to 40 minute span. i have since searched the area where the fireball object disappeared and was unable to find any trace of it. nothing. i also went as far as to check how much wind we had at that exact time and our winds were at 0. was a very  very calm night. nothing since then though. i am very upset the video was not found on my phone not to mention confused as to what happened to it. i have never seen anything like i saw that night. for some reason though, as close as it was to me, and even stopping right in front of me, i did not feel any fear.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red/orange/black fireball

content.detailedDescription: I had crossing texas by nightfall on my mind and traffic was easy. the weather was cooler than usual and i was confident i would make my way to atlanta georgia on time. i watched this craft which i thought i was dreaming or maybe after viewing several in my youth, i might be getting used to seeing them. anyway i opened my eyes as wide as i could to see what i belived to be a space craft traveling pretty fast maybe 150-200 mph then speed up to 500 mph in a couple seconds. it was coming right at me then passed right in front of me and i thought it was going to attack me or something. then i saw a us military aircraft, guessing f-16 attempting to follow it. 30 seconds later another f-16 followed but on a slightly northwest path meaning the craft traveling south to north followed by thefirst f-16 south to nortth must have changed direction to have the second f-16 head nw. there were no other vehicles on that stretch of interstate 10 for a 15-20 minutes, which might or might not be normal.I had thought i missed some kind of public announcement about alien craft being chased park it until further notice.I looked back on the incident when i stopped in midland texas for a soda and ask if any government announcements and the cashier looked at me kind of irritated.As i left the store i remember thinking if you saw what i just saw an hour or soago you would ...Et was being chased.... anyway atlanta here i come.
content.summary: I was driving tractor trailer as a full fledged professional driver after completeing my cdl course and otr training.

content.detailedDescription: I had got back from getting married in hawaii and was enroute to chandler az. interstate 8 i was running west to east when out of the south appeared a missile shaped craft traveling a couple hundred miles per hour. i watched it pass overhead maybe 500 feet and there wasn't any noise. one of the first thoughts i had was mexico firing missiles into the us?? i had heard of the drug cartel employing a similar strategy to deliver drugs but this craft continued to the small mountains directly noth and disappeared. the small town just north is visible and so as a visual aid to distance the craft passed over that town and would then need to have stopped immediately before entering chandler az. when i arrived to the truck stop in casa grande another driver asked me why i wasn't going to report what i had just saw? that caught me off guard and i realized others obviously must have seen it although no one was as close as i was. the nearest person would have been a rancher a half mile away, if he had happened to see it. there were no other vehicles on i8 for at leat 2-3 miles west or east of me.
content.summary: Driving tractor trailer from san diego ca.To casa grande az truck stop to pick up in chandler az.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving one of my usual routes from california to the phoenix  arizona area on interstate 10. i had plenty of daylight still and saw a bright light low on the horizon about 5-10 miles directly east of me.Curios why any aircraft would have their headlamps on and realized from passing by several california and arizona airports at various times of day and night this wasn't a usual size and brightness. as the craft and all on the interstate got closer it was a disc shaped, but was huge, probably 300 feet across, the edge was about 10 feet tall and sloped slightly towards the middle where it could have an estimated height of 20 feet at its center.
the cb radios started clamoring "did you see that, the thing was huge. we are being invaded"
content.summary: Driving a load of refrigerated product to pheonix az and noticed a shiny object about 5 miles east. i noticed it was getting brighter and brighter but did not know why.

content.detailedDescription:
I captured this picture of a craft while taking photos of a severe storm.  the day was june 17th, 2013 at 4:58pm (est).   unfortunately, there was no sound from this craft, nor did it get my attention while shooting this picture.  sad, i did not get the opportunity to watch it.
a couple of weeks after i took the picture, i noticed a cigar shape object just underneath a severe storm cloud. as i zoomed into this object, i noticed it had little resemblance of an airliner.  
i know there wasn't any aircraft flying in the area of this severe storm, because the intensity of the storm was extremely high.  i am about 40 miles away from any domestic/international airports.  they do not take this area as a flight path due to the military airbase about 3 miles away.  also, there was no military planes flying due to the weather conditions.  they do not fly at this time of day, even if it is a clear day.

this ufo seemed to have been hovering underneath this storm.  it is approximately 1 mile from my residence.  i took the picture looking north.
in the top, left hand area of the picture, you can see the craft relatively clear.    
i enhanced a couple of the copies of the original picture and also included the non enhanced picture of the ufo.  it made it easier to see the craft with the enhancements.  
the other two pictures are the same areas of the storm, but taken in different locations. only a 1.5 minute difference between all 3 pictures. these pictures are not enhanced.  
 

file 1:  original picture
file 2:  sepia enhanced 
file 3:  color enhanced
file 4:  picture taken just before craft is visible
file 5:  first picture taken of storm.  (2 behind pictured craft)
content.summary: Ufo seen under a severe storm

content.detailedDescription:
From asd - i am reporting this incident for information purposes at the request of chuck zukowski and state director debbie ziegelmeyer.  no ufo was seen, however, there is a possible landing mark and since ufos have been seen in connection with animal mutilations cases in the past it may be useful to have this on record.  this is the third known mutilation on the same ranch.  please see the attached reports for more detail.  the case is ongoing, i am setting up camera traps on the site and have submitted samples for lab analysis through chuck z. 

date of discovery: july 19, 2013  time: 9:30 a.M. 
nw corner of henry county, 84 miles se of kansas city 

______________________________
7/19/2013
the rancher called me at 10:00 a.M. this morning to report that she had another dead cow that she just found on her property.  she called the sheriff and a veterinarian and they were already on their way to the site.  
the witness had been at the site on wednesday and left at 6 pm.  she took thursday off and returned on friday morning to find the dead cow.  it had been 39 1/2 hours since her last site visit. 
i arrived at 1:00 p.M. with another investigator. the site is approximately 75 yards from the second gate to the property, and it was another 100+ yards to the gate at the road.  the vet just left the scene and he examined the cow.  the cow was found with a cut in the front of the body between the front two legs, and the heart outside the body.  all of the teats had been cut off of the udder, the tongue was cut out, and one eye was missing (the eye may have been missing due to vultures or maggots, which were already on the cow).  the vet had the rancher roll the cow over with a tractor so he could examine the other side so when we arrived the animal had been moved slightly but was in the same location. 
the men opened up the wound in the front of the cow between the front legs in order to view the interior better.  this included moving the ribs.   the vet said that there was no blood on the ground, the cuts were precise, and that the heart and chest cavity had little blood in them, which was very unusual and unexplainable.  he vet also said that he knew animals did not cause the wounds.  he looked for bullet holes or other injuries to the cow but could find none, and he does not know the cause of death. 
the rancher is going to obtain a copy of the report from the veterinarian and the police report in the next couple of days. the rancher  
said that this was another of her best cows, and that she produced a calf every year.  the cow was 7 years old and valued at approximately $2,000.
what we found on site: a strange darkened outline around where the cow was lying on on the ground, which looks like it has been burned.  also found an imprint in a cow pie that does not match up to any known animal or human boot print.  no people should have been on the property besides the ranchers.  it was not a tire print. could this have been a landing site? 
-----------------------------------------
7/11/2013
received an e-mail from chuck zukowski about a cow mutilation case in henry county.  i spoke to the witness today and she stated following: 
the rancher found the cow yesterday, july 10 in the north side of her property.  it was lying dead on her left side, with her rear end, tongue, and udder removed.  the witness did not raise the head of the cow to look at the second eye. the witness had driven by the night before, but did not see anything, however, it was dark and the cow is black so it may have been there.   the cow had maggots on it, so it had been there at least a couple of days.   it has been very hot, up to 100 degrees and very dry.  the witness saw vultures on her on july 10.  the witness said that normally birds will fly around when something dies, but they were not there before july 10.  it was 100 degrees at the time she found the cow so it is decomposing rapidly.  she has registered black angus cows and this one was her best, a 7 ���year old in her prime that would have produced more calves in the future.  the cow was worth $2,000.  she wonders if it was random or if whoever/whatever did this was looking for the best of the herd.  the witness has not seen any other cows going near this one. 

note: the witness says that as of today - july 24 - no coyotes have eaten on the carcasses.  this is not normal. 

--------------------------------
dec 2011
a mutilated heifer calf was found on the site with its tongue and female genitalia removed and part of the jaw tissue and muscle removed to the bone. the rancher buried the calf at that time. 
----------------------------------

i made two youtube videos with interviews with the witness
content.summary: Cow mutilation, third case on same property, possible ufo landing site

content.detailedDescription: 9:15 pm, july 20th, 2013, saturday evening. davenport florida. my wife was on the back screen porch when she saw a red light in the northeast sky. she watched it for 1 minute, then wnt in to get me from the bedroom, exclaiming that there is a ufo outside. i got up from reading in bed and went out to the front yard. red/orange star-like object observed traveling at a slow rate of speed traversing the cloudy dark night sky moving toward the southwest. we observe it for about 1 minute as it moved across the sky. then it stopped moving. i watched intensely for a half minute or so and observed that it was erraticcly moving about in one place, that is to say, it was not perfectly stopped or idle, just no longer moving across the sky. rather, a difficult to detect movement, but certain that it was erratic. to check that it wasn't my eyes creating an illusion i looked to the north where i observed a jet airliner moving east to west in the northeast quandrant of the sky. i observed the jet (jet lights) clearly, thus concluding my eyesight was fine. i continued to observe the stalled object and asked my wife to run to the bedroom to get my binoculars. she did, though reluctantly. as i began to handle the binoculars outside preparing to use them and removing my eyeglasses, i looked back up, and to our dissapointment, it had vanished from sight. we did not see the moment of disappearance. i noticed the sky in the south and verified that the sky was completely cloudy. i then reasoned that the light was able to be seen even though it was travelling through a cloudy/overcast sky. we briefly discussed the matter then went inside to further our discussion. it is the 24th of july as i am reporting this, and we have not witnessed it again, although we are not really spending any time outside looking for another sighting. we have never experienced a ufo in our lives until that day.
content.summary: Red star-like object passes across the nigh sky

content.detailedDescription: I needed some fresh air and wanted to investigate the new enviroment of eureka california. my friend and i had moved there in october 1996, and i had been told the river near garbrville was a good destination to start. i was driving 50 mph taking in the scenery and as i rounded a curve i noticed a disc shaped craft near the ridge line across the river.Possibly a half mile away, i watched it move north slowly and then it headed slightly towards me. it was not noticeable because i was traveling straight south and then into another s-curve. then as i came out of that curve i looked and it was directly east of me and much closer.I was concerned because there wasn't alot of traffic.When a car passed going north i tried to make eye contact and the man and women but they did not look in my direction.  i watched the craft another 10 -15 seconds and then it vanished from sight. i arrived into garberville  5-7 minutes later and had a cup of tea. i wasn't sure what to do and hoped nothing happened to anyone,the news paper did not have any reports until a few days later when a small group reported a similar sighting.The first and second views were at an excellent angles. the first at a 45 degrees, the sunlight was just over the ridge and the lighting was picture perfect. the second was equally good, because the craft was just slightly north and east so the reflection off of the craft showed a main body as having a shiny surface rotating clockwise. the dome shape on top was reflective and white silver a touch lighter in color than the main body and not rotating.
content.summary: Driving south to see some scenery along  us 101, i rounded a curve and noticed a disc shaped aircraft moving along the ridge to the southeast. the craft came closer and hovered about 100 yds. away.
